import React from "react"; import { Form, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ShoppingBagItems = ({ shoppingBagItems }) => { console.log(shoppingBagItems); return (
    {shoppingBagItems.map((item) => (

  • {item.productData.title}

    Rs. {item.productData.price}

    {item.description}

    Qty x {item.quantity}

    • ))}
); }; export default ShoppingBagItems;
